name: Craig Baxley Jr.
biography: Craig Baxley Jr. is known for his work on R.I.P.D. (2013), Transcendence (2014) and Captain America: The First Avenger (2011).::Anonymous
trivia: From a stunt family, he is the son of Craig R. Baxley, grandson of Paul Baxley, nephew of Gary Baxley and cousin of Hunter Baxley. and father of Cash Baxley.
Signed to be the Marlboro Man in 2011.
